DOC.brief_summary: This research do increase knowledge wound heal different factor may affect heal burn patient .
DOC.brief_title: HIF-1 Regulated Endothelial Progenitor Cell ( EPC ) Recruitment Burn Wound Healing
DOC.criteria: Recruitment patient Johns Hopkins Regional Burn Center study base upon follow clinical criterion : 1 . Second degree scald burn 10 cm2 2 . Age 14 75 year 3 . Burn area equal le 95 % BSA 4 . Body temperature 98.5 101 degree F 5 . Informed consent enrolment study 6 . Spanish speaking patient include Spanish consent form available . 1 . First third degree burn wound 2 . Hemodynamic instability ( SBP 100 , HR 100 , urine output le 30 ml/hour 3 . Area burn 20 % BSA 4 . Hypothermia T < 98.5 Hyperthermia T > 101 degree F 5 . Urine output le 30 ml/hour 6 . Serum albumin less 3 mg/ml . 7 . Subjects weigh less 50 kg .
